oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-02-28 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from February 28, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer), guest performers Johnnie & Jack, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Archie Campbell, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1012th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ernest Tubb; Jordanaires; Johnnie & Jack; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ernest Tubb -- The Women Make A Fool Out Of Me (Ernest Tubb) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces the Jordanaires -- My Journey To The Sky (Jordanaires) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Johnnie & Jack -- What Do You Know About Heartaches (Johnnie & Jack) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Tommy Jackson -- Wake Up Susan (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Ernest Tubb and Grant Turner talk -- Stand By Me (Ernest Tubb, Jordanaires) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Chet Atkins -- Black Mountain Rag (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Campbell, Archie; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Byrd, Billy; Emmons, Buddy; Johnnie & Jack; Wright, Johnnie, 1914-2011; Anglin, Jack, 1916-1963; Tennessee Mountain Boys
